com.mashery.http

Class MutableURI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mashery.http.URI
      • com.mashery.http.MutableURI

  • public class MutableURI
extends URI
    Mutable variant of URI.
    Restriction
    This class is not intended to be subclassed by clients.
